title: SPECIAL PREVIEW - Up On Game - Hour 2 - A Nightmare for the Cowboys and the Packers are Looking for Love
itunes:title: SPECIAL PREVIEW - Up On Game - Hour 2 - A Nightmare for the Cowboys and the Packers are Looking for Love
description:
LaVar Arrington, TJ Houshmandzadeh, and Plaxico Burress react to Dak Prescott getting a second MRI on his shoulder, and the guys debate the level of concern the Cowboys should have over their franchise QB. Mike McCarthy is putting on a show with his championship-or-best mentality. The guys break down what expectations should be for Jordan Love and Zach Wilson in their preseason debuts.

Subscribe, rate and review the Up On Game podcast here!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
